posts.postText:
hey, so I tried to work on a sig, but I failed pretty badly. I would like someone to help me with a project. 
well, my in-game name is "nez", and that's my tag name irl. so, I tried to make it look cool, like spray paint and a tag on a wall, but it looks kinda awful.

 http://i56.tinypic.com/2ec18v4.png 

Anyone wanna help? If you help, and I actually use/want it. I will give you all my TTT points I earn for a while. (I get like 100 every time I'm on.)

@Inferno - I like it, but in the name, the black background thing, theres like a little square missing out of it, and the background looks weird.

Edit: The city looking background is cool, just the back in the NAME, is weird.

Lemme fix that hold on

EDIT: This better? 

 http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/7266/nez2.jpg 

hold on that quality sucks

 http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/7696/nez2.png 

There we go
Yeah was trying to use an old sig format. The original was amazing though... Just wish i could replicate it
